'''Notes'''
This is my second report for this laptop. First one can be found at https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Testing/Laptop/Maverick/toshibaSatelliteProA300 . Everything works out of the box with Ubuntu 12.04 without need for any proprietary drivers. On the top of standard tests, I have managed to test FireWire, extended suspend test, expanstion port and multimedia card slot. All proved to work just fine.

Limitations of this laptop:
** no build-in microphone
** no webcam
** no HDMI
** card reader doesn't work with HCSD
